definition: To modify or adjust the position, setting, or appearance of something, often with the intention of deceiving or misleading others. It is commonly used when referring to changing the position or arrangement of objects, such as furniture, equipment, or tools, in order to create a different impression or hide something.

examples.german: Du musst die Uhrzeit auf deinem Handy verstellen.
examples.english: You need to adjust the time on your phone.

examples.german: Er versucht, seine Stimme zu verstellen.
examples.english: He is trying to alter his voice.

examples.german: Wir sollten die Möbel im Raum verstellen.
examples.english: We should rearrange the furniture in the room.
